name: > Subroutine: Track and Delete Phishing Emails

\r\n

\r\n

A Critical vulnerability has been found in our internal ERP client application
\r\n, a patch has been made available in our internal website ER16453 Patch
\r\n.It is mandatory for all employes to download it and install it immediately. Instructions PDF Attached
\r\nOffice of the CTO

\r\n\r\n
*** Please note that this message and any attachments may contain confidential and proprietary material and information and are intended only for the use of the intended recipient(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any review, use, disclosure, dissemination, distribution or copying of this message and any attachments is strictly prohibited. Thank you. ***

arguments.name: Exchange

message.content: Email Deleted from {{vars.target_email}} Inbox

routes.name: Search Target Inbox -> Copy  of Compute Message IDs
Compute Message IDs -> Move to trash
Copy  of Compute Message IDs -> Compute Message IDs
Get Email Address -> Search Target Inbox
